name: Don't Fall! (Nurobit Games)
description:
Play in a Chromium based browser!

Don't Fall! is a  competitive two player rag-doll game. Push and throw the enemy off the platform. Don't fall! There's also a single player survival challenge.

Details

Don't Fall! was originally made over the course of a weekend. It reached over a million plays on the Chrome Web Store and Scirra Arcade.
